Articles.Content:
Here's an interplanetary transfer vehicle:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/GWgwH)

Delta-v: 4258

Kerbals: 11

Docking ports: 2

Solar panels: 2

Engines: 2 non-nuclear (feel free to put nuclear engines on it)

RCS & SAS

Untested: Yes (it should work)

Stock: YES!

Designed to launch atop a Omega: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113356-It-s-here!-The-Omega-good-looking-heavy-lift-vehicle](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113356-It-s-here!-The-Omega-good-looking-heavy-lift-vehicle)

The Omega second stage has enough fuel to put this on a kerbin escape trajectory.

Built with stock revamp(works with stock).

Enjoy:

I removed pfairing parts from the download.

[Download](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/Interplanetary-shark)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T03:04:58Z" title="06/27/2015 03:04  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**
Hello, you should remove the stock tag as you used some mods in the build. Ooh, and welcome to the forum!

I should have only used stock revamp which I believe is compatible with stock, I'll test it when I get a chance.

P.S.

The pics show pfairings but I removed those from the download.

P.P.S.

Thanks for the welcome!

EDIT:

Works with stock.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T21:13:03Z" title="03/18/2015 09:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by Mad Rocket Scientist**

I'm about to check whether this rocket works with stock.(Copying KSP over to another folder.)

EDIT:

Works with stock.
